content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Escrow Officer – Katy office (Katy, TX)

We are looking for an Escrow Officer for our Katy office. The Escrow Officer is responsible for managing real estate escrow transactions and delivering quality customer service. More Info >

How to Apply
Submit resume to: contactus@allegiancetitle.com

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Front Desk Assistant – Frisco office (Frisco, TX)

We are looking for a Front Desk Assistant for our Frisco office. The Front Desk Assistant is responsible for performing routine clerical, secretarial, and administrative work answering telephones, receiving the public, providing customer assistance, data processing, and record-keeping all in accordance with established policies and procedures while providing excellent customer service.  More Info>

How to Apply
Submit resume to: nwood@allegiancetitle.com

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Escrow Assistant – San Antonio office (San Antonio, TX)

We are looking for an Escrow Assistant in our San Antonio office in San Antonio. This Escrow Assistant will support several Escrow Officers in closing real-estate transaction quickly and on schedule. The EA’s responsibilities are critical to getting a file cleared and ready to close. More Info >
Submit resume to: contactus@allegiancetitle.com

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
